alert.title: Airport Alert
alert.text: Los Angeles (LAX) construction - LAX is undergoing a large-scale modernization project. Please be advised that Customers may experience delays or inconveniences traveling to/from LAX during this time. Plan more time to get to/from the airport and check your flight status on Southwest.com. Visit www.laxishappening.com for more airport information.

body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.
